name: piddly
description: Dependency injection the size of a pin head

scripts.postinstall: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.browserify: node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/piddly.js -s piddly -d | node_modules/.bin/exorcist browser/piddly.map > browser/piddly.js
scripts.uglify: node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs browser/piddly.js --in-source-map browser/piddly.map -c -m -o browser/piddly.min.js --source-map browser/piddly.min.map --source-map-url piddly.min.map
